Title: Republic Act No. 1
Description: AN ACT APPROPRIATING FUNDS FOR THE OPERATION OF THE GOVERNMENT OF THE COMMONWEALTH OF THE PHILIPPINES BEGINNING JULY FIRST, NINETEEN HUNDRED AND FORTY-SIX, UNTIL THE GENERAL APPROPRIATION ACT FOR THE FISCAL YEAR NINETEEN HUNDRED AND FORTY-SEVEN IS APPROVED.

Title: Republic Act No. 2
Description: AN ACT APPROPRIATING FIFTY THOUSAND PESOS TO DEFRAY THE EXPENSES OF A STATE FUNERAL FOR MANUEL L. QUEZON AND FOR THE ERECTION OF A MAUSOLEUM TO CONTAIN HIS REMAINS.

Title: Republic Act No. 3
Description: AN ACT TO CONTINUE IN FORCE AND EFFECT THE ACT OF THE CONGRESS OF THE UNITED STATES, APPROVED ON AUGUST 5, 1909, ENTITLED "AN ACT TO RAISE REVENUE FOR THE PHILIPPINE ISLANDS, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES," OTHERWISE KNOWN AS "THE PHILIPPINE TARIFF LAW OF 1909," AS AMENDED.

Title: Republic Act No. 4
Description: AN ACT TO AMEND SECTION TWENTY-SIX HUNDRED AND NINETY-TWO OF THE REVISED ADMINISTRATIVE CODE, AND TO EXEMPT FROM RESPONSIBILITY THOSE WHO SHOULD SURRENDER FIREARMS UNDER CERTAIN CONDITIONS, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES.

Title: Republic Act No. 5
Description: AN ACT TO AMEND SECTIONS TWO AND FIVE OF COMMONWEALTH ACT NUMBERED FIVE HUNDRED EIGHTEEN, ENTITLED "AN ACT TO ESTABLISH THE NATIONAL COCONUT CORPORATION, AND TO APPROPRIATE ADDITIONAL OPERATING CAPITAL FOR SAID CORPORATION."

Title: Republic Act No. 6
Description: AN ACT TO PROVIDE THAT AS OF THE DATE OF THE PROCLAMATION OF THE REPUBLIC OF THE PHILIPPINES THE PRESENT CONGRESS OF THE PHILIPPINES SHALL BE KNOWN AS THE FIRST CONGRESS OF THE REPUBLIC OF THE PHILIPPINES, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSE.

Title: Republic Act No. 7
Description: AN ACT TO ESTABLISH THE FOREIGN FUNDS CONTROL OFFICE, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES

Title: Republic Act No. 8
Description: AN ACT TO AUTHORIZE THE PRESIDENT OF THE PHILIPPINES TO ENTER INTO SUCH CONTRACTS OR UNDERTAKINGS AS MAY BE NECESSARY TO EFFECTUATE THE TRANSFER TO THE REPUBLIC OF THE PHILIPPINES UNDER THE PHILIPPINE PROPERTY ACT OF NINETEEN HUNDRED AND FORTY-SIX OF ANY PROPERTY OR PROPERTY RIGHTS OR THE PROCEEDS THEREOF AUTHORIZED TO BE TRANSFERRED UNDER SAID ACT; PROVIDING FOR THE ADMINISTRATION AND DISPOSITION OF SUCH PROPERTIES ONCE RECEIVED; AND APPROPRIATING THE NECESSARY FUNDS THEREFOR.

Title: Republic Act No. 10
Description: AN ACT PENALIZING USURPATION OF PUBLIC AUTHORITY

Title: Republic Act No. 11
Description: AN ACT TO PROHIBIT THE SLAUGHTERING OF MALE AND FEMALE CARABAOS, HORSES, MARES, AND COWS.

Title: Republic Act No. 12
Description: AN ACT AMENDING ARTICLES ONE HUNDRED FORTY-SIX, TWO HUNDRED NINETY-FIVE, TWO HUNDRED NINETY-SIX AND THREE HUNDRED SIX OF THE REVISED PENAL CODE.

Title: Republic Act No. 13
Description: AN ACT TO AMEND SECTIONS FIVE AND SIX OF COMMONWEALTH ACT NUMBERED SIX HUNDRED AND SEVENTY-TWO, ENTITLED "AN ACT TO REHABILITATE THE PHILIPPINE NATIONAL BANK".

Title: Republic Act No. 14
Description: AN ACT TO CHANGE THE NAME OF THE PROVINCE OF TAYABAS TO QUEZON

Title: Republic Act No. 15
Description: AN ACT PROVIDING THAT IN ANY CRIMINAL PROCEEDING BEFORE A JUSTICE OF THE PEACE NO COST DE OFICIO SHALL BE TAXED AGAINST THE MUNICIPALITY CONCERNED WHEN THE CASE IS DISMISSED OR THE DEFENDANT ACQUITTED.

Title: Republic Act No. 16
Description: AN ACT AUTHORIZING THE PRESIDENT OF THE PHILIPPINES TO OBTAIN SUCH LOANS OR INCUR SUCH INDEBTEDNESS WITH THE GOVERNMENT OF THE UNITED STATES, ITS AGENCIES AND INSTRUMENTALITIES, AS MAY BE NECESSARY TO COVER BUDGETARY DEFICITS AND OTHER EXPENDITURES OF THE GOVERNMENT OF THE REPUBLIC OF THE PHILIPPINES FOR REHABILITATION AND OTHER PURPOSES, AND APPROPRIATING THE NECESSARY FUNDS THEREFOR.

Title: Republic Act No. 17
Description: AN ACT TO PROVIDE FOR THE CIRCULATION OF TREASURY CERTIFICATES WITH THE OFFICIAL SEAL OF THE REPUBLIC OF THE PHILIPPINES STAMPED, PRINTED OR SUPERIMPOSED THEREON, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES.

Title: Republic Act No. 18
Description: AN ACT TO AMEND ARTICLES SIXTY-TWO, TWO HUNDRED AND SIXTY-SEVEN, TWO HUNDRED AND SIXTY-EIGHT, TWO HUNDRED AND SEVENTY, TWO HUNDRED AND SEVENTY-ONE, TWO HUNDRED AND NINETY-FOUR, AND TWO HUNDRED AND NINETY-NINE OF THE REVISED PENAL CODE.

Title: Republic Act No. 19
Description: AN ACT APPROPRIATING THE SUM OF ONE HUNDRED THOUSAND PESOS FOR THE IMPROVEMENT OF THE MATERNITY AND CHILDREN'S HOSPITAL IN THE CITY OF MANILA.

Title: Republic Act No. 20
Description: AN ACT TO AMEND SECTIONS TWELVE HUNDRED AND FIFTY-SIX, THIRTEEN HUNDRED AND NINETY-FIVE, SUBSECTION (c), AND THIRTEEN HUNDRED AND NINETY-EIGHT OF THE REVISED ADMINISTRATIVE CODE.

Title: Republic Act No. 21
Description: AN ACT AUTHORIZING THE LEGITIMATE FATHER, OR, IN HIS DEFAULT, THE MOTHER, OF ANY MINOR OR INCOMPETENT PERSON HAVING A CLAIM OR SHARE IN A CLAIM AGAINST THE GOVERNMENT OF THE PHILIPPINES OR OF THE UNITED STATES, TO RECEIVE PAYMENT OF SAID CLAIM OR SHARE WHEN THE AMOUNT THEREOF DOES NOT EXCEED FIVE HUNDRED PESOS OR ITS EQUIVALENT IN DOLLARS.

Title: Republic Act No. 22
Description: AN ACT PROVIDING FOR THE CREATION OF AN EMERGENCY CURRENCY BOARD, THE REGISTRATION, DEPOSIT AND OUTLAWING OF EMERGENCY CURRENCY NOTES, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES.

Title: Republic Act No. 23
Description: AN ACT TO AMEND SECTION EIGHT OF ACT NUMBERED FORTY-ONE HUNDRED AND NINE, AS AMENDED, ENTITLED, "AN ACT TO CREATE AN ANTI-USURY BOARD, TO PRESCRIBE THE DUTIES AND FUNCTIONS OF THE SAID BOARD, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES."

Title: Republic Act No. 24
Description: AN ACT PROVIDING FOR THE PAYMENT OF THE SALARY OF THE CITY AUDITOR OF MANILA FROM THE FUNDS OF SAID CITY AT THE RATE OF EIGHT THOUSAND PESOS PER ANNUM.

Title: Republic Act No. 25
Description: AN ACT TO INCREASE THE COMPENSATION OF FLIGHT OFFICERS AND ENLISTED MEN OF THE AIR CORPS OF THE PHILIPPINE ARMY.

Title: Republic Act No. 26
Description: AN ACT PROVIDING A SPECIAL PROCEDURE FOR THE RECONSTITUTION OF TORRENS CERTIFICATES OF TITLE LOST OR DESTROYED.

Title: Republic Act No. 27
Description: AN ACT TO REPEAL ACT NUMBERED TWO THOUSAND TWO HUNDRED AND EIGHTY-SEVEN, AS AMENDED BY ACTS NUMBERED TWO THOUSAND THREE HUNDRED AND ONE, THREE THOUSAND EIGHT HUNDRED AND FORTY-THREE, AND FOUR THOUSAND AND NINETY-SIX.

Title: Republic Act No. 28
Description: AN ACT AUTHORIZING MUNICIPALITIES TO CONTRACT LOANS FROM THE AGRICULTURAL AND INDUSTRIAL BANK FOR THE CONSTRUCTION OF PUBLIC MARKETS AND SLAUGHTERHOUSES.

Title: Republic Act No. 29
Description: AN ACT AUTHORIZING PROVINCIAL AND MUNICIPAL GOVERNMENTS AND CHARTERED CITIES TO GRANT LIVING BONUS.

Title: Republic Act No. 30
Description: AN ACT AUTHORIZING THE PAYMENT, UNDER CERTAIN CONDITIONS, OF A GRATUITY TO THE WIDOW AND/OR CHILDREN, AND IN THEIR ABSENCE TO THE OTHER HEIRS, OF A DECEASED OFFICER OR MEMBER OF ANY POLICE FORCE OR SIMILAR GOVERNMENTAL ORGANIZATION ENGAGED IN THE MAINTENANCE OF PEACE AND ORDER, APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR.

Title: Republic Act No. 31
Description: AN ACT TO AMEND SECTIONS SIX, SEVEN AND FOURTEEN OF ACT NUMBERED TWENTY-SIX HUNDRED AND THIRTEEN, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE TOBACCO INSPECTION LAW.

Title: Republic Act No. 32
Description: AN ACT TO AMEND ACT NUMBERED FOUR THOUSAND AND THIRTY-FIVE OF THE PHILIPPINE LEGISLATURE ENTITLED "AN ACT TO PREVENT DUMPING OF IMPORTED ARTICLES, WARES, OR MERCHANDISE, TO DISCOURAGE UNFAIR PRACTICES OR METHODS IN THE IMPORT TRADE, TO IMPOSE SPECIAL CUSTOMS DUTIES THEREFOR, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES."

Title: Republic Act No. 33
Description: AN ACT TO APPROVE THE AGREEMENT ENTERED INTO BETWEEN THE GOVERNMENT OF THE REPUBLIC OF THE PHILIPPINES AND THE GOVERNMENT OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA, DATED SEPTEMBER ELEVENTH, NINETEEN HUNDRED AND FORTY-SIX; TO AUTHORIZE THE ACCEPTANCE, ADMINISTRATION, SALE, AND DISPOSITION OF THE SURPLUS PROPERTY ACQUIRED THEREUNDER; AND TO APPROPRIATE THE NECESSARY FUNDS FOR THE PURPOSE.

Title: Republic Act No. 34
Description: AN ACT AMENDING CERTAIN SECTIONS OF ACT NUMBERED FOUR THOUSAND FIFTY-FOUR, AS AMENDED, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS "THE PHILIPPINE RICE SHARE TENANCY ACT."

Title: Republic Act No. 35
Description: AN ACT AUTHORIZING THE EXEMPTION OF NEW AND NECESSARY INDUSTRIES FROM THE PAYMENT OF INTERNAL REVENUE TAXES.

Title: Republic Act No. 36
Description: CENSUS ACT OF NINETEEN HUNDRED AND FORTY-SIX

Title: Republic Act No. 9
Description: AN ACT TO AUTHORIZE THE PRESIDENT OF THE PHILIPPINES TO ENTER INTO AN AGREEMENT OR AGREEMENTS WITH THE GOVERNMENT OF THE UNITED STATES PURSUANT TO UNITED STATES PUBLIC ACT NUMBERED FOUR HUNDRED AND FIFTY-FOUR, COMMONLY CALLED THE "REPUBLIC OF THE PHILIPPINES MILITARY ASSISTANCE ACT," AND TO ISSUE THE NECESSARY RULES AND REGULATIONS TO IMPLEMENT SAID ACT, AND PROVIDING PENALTIES FOR VIOLATIONS THEREOF.

Title: Republic Act No. 37
Description: AN ACT GRANTING PREFERENCE TO FILIPINO CITIZENS IN THE LEASE OF PUBLIC MARKET STALLS.

Title: Republic Act No. 38
Description: AN ACT REPEALING COMMONWEALTH ACT NUMBERED FIVE HUNDRED AND EIGHTY-ONE, ENTITLED "AN ACT ABOLISHING THE EXISTING MUNICIPAL GOVERNMENTS AND THE PROVINCIAL GOVERNMENT OF ROMBLON, AND CREATING INSTEAD FOUR SPECIAL MUNICIPALITIES," RESTORING THE REGULAR PROVINCIAL GOVERNMENT AND MUNICIPALITIES OF THE PROVINCE OF ROMBLON, AND CREATING THE MUNICIPALITY OF SANTA FE.

Title: Republic Act No. 39
Description: AN ACT AMENDING OR REPEALING CERTAIN SECTIONS OF TITLES V AND VIII OF THE NATIONAL INTERNAL REVENUE CODE.

Title: Republic Act No. 40
Description: AN ACT TO AMEND CERTAIN SECTIONS OF THE NATIONAL INTERNAL REVENUE CODE, RELATIVE TO DOCUMENTARY STAMP TAXES.

Title: Republic Act No. 41
Description: AN ACT AMENDING OR REPEALING CERTAIN SECTIONS OF TITLE V OF THE NATIONAL INTERNAL REVENUE CODE.

Title: Republic Act No. 42
Description: AN ACT TO AMEND SECTIONS ONE HUNDRED AND EIGHTY-TWO, ONE HUNDRED AND NINETY-THREE, SUBSECTIONS (O), (R), AND (S) OF SECTION ONE HUNDRED AND NINETY-FOUR AND SECTION TWO HUNDRED AND ONE OF COMMONWEALTH ACT NUMBERED FOUR HUNDRED AND SIXTY-SIX.

Title: Republic Act No. 43
Description: AN ACT TO ESTABLISH, ORGANIZE AND MAINTAIN ONE NATIONAL AGRICULTURAL SCHOOL IN THE PROVINCE OF NEGROS OCCIDENTAL AND TO APPROPRIATE CERTAIN SUMS OF MONEY FOR THE PURPOSE.

Title: Republic Act No. 44
Description: AN ACT TO REVISE COMMONWEALTH ACT NUMBERED FOUR HUNDRED AND SIXTY-ONE, ENTITLED "AN ACT TO REGULATE THE RELATIONS BETWEEN LANDOWNER AND TENANT AND TO PROVIDE FOR COMPULSORY ARBITRATION OF ANY CONTROVERSY ARISING BETWEEN THEM," AS AMENDED BY COMMONWEALTH ACT NUMBERED SIX HUNDRED AND EIGHT.

Title: Republic Act No. 45
Description: AN ACT TO FIX THE DATE OF THE REGULAR ELECTIONS FOR ELECTIVE PROVINCIAL, CITY AND MUNICIPAL OFFICES, AND OF THE ELECTION OF THE EIGHT SENATORS WHO WILL SUCCEED THOSE WHOSE TERM OF OFFICE WILL EXPIRE ON DECEMBER THIRTIETH, NINETEEN HUNDRED AND FORTY-SEVEN.

Title: Republic Act No. 46
Description: AN ACT TO AMEND ACT NUMBERED THIRTY-NINE HUNDRED AND SIXTY-ONE, ENTITLED "AN ACT TO PROVIDE FREE EMERGENCY MEDICAL TREATMENT FOR EMPLOYEES AND LABORERS OF COMMERCIAL, INDUSTRIAL, AND AGRICULTURAL ESTABLISHMENTS, IN CERTAIN CASES, PROVIDE PENALTIES FOR THE VIOLATION HEREOF, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES."

Title: Republic Act No. 47
Description: AN ACT TO AMEND ARTICLE EIGHTY OF THE REVISED PENAL CODE, AS AMENDED

Title: Republic Act No. 48
Description: AN ACT TO AMEND CERTAIN ADMINISTRATIVE PROVISIONS OF COMMONWEALTH ACT NUMBERED FOUR HUNDRED AND SIXTY-SIX, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE NATIONAL INTERNAL REVENUE CODE.

Title: Republic Act No. 49
Description: AN ACT TO AMEND SECTION FOURTEEN HUNDRED AND FOURTEEN OF THE REVISED ADMINISTRATIVE CODE, AS AMENDED.

Title: Republic Act No. 50
Description: AN ACT TO CONVERT THE SUBURB OF LUCENA OF THE MUNICIPALITY OF SANTA BARBARA, PROVINCE OF ILOILO, INTO A REGULAR MUNICIPALITY.

Title: Republic Act No. 51
Description: AN ACT AUTHORIZING THE PRESIDENT OF THE PHILIPPINES TO REORGANIZE WITHIN ONE YEAR THE DIFFERENT EXECUTIVE DEPARTMENTS, BUREAUS, OFFICES, AGENCIES AND OTHER INSTRUMENTALITIES OF THE GOVERNMENT, INCLUDING THE CORPORATIONS OWNED OR CONTROLLED BY IT.

Title: Republic Act No. 52
Description: AN ACT TO REPEAL EXECUTIVE ORDER NUMBERED THIRTY-SEVEN, DATED THE TENTH OF MARCH, NINETEEN HUNDRED AND FORTY-FIVE, AND TO REVIVE, WITH CERTAIN AMENDMENDS, SECTIONS ONE HUNDRED AND FORTY-FIVE-A TO ONE HUNDRED AND FORTY-FIVE-Q OF THE REVISED ADMINISTRATIVE CODE AS HEREIN AMENDED, SO AS TO RECREATE THE COURT OF APPEALS.

Title: Republic Act No. 53
Description: AN ACT TO EXEMPT THE PUBLISHER, EDITOR OR REPORTER OF ANY PUBLICATION FROM REVEALING THE SOURCE OF PUBLISHED NEWS OR INFORMATION OBTAINED IN CONFIDENCE.

Title: Republic Act No. 54
Description: AN ACT TO REPEAL EXECUTIVE ORDER NUMBERED FOUR HUNDRED DATED JANUARY TWO, NINETEEN HUNDRED AND FORTY-TWO AND EXECUTIVE ORDER NUMBERED FIFTY-EIGHT DATED JULY TWENTY-SIX, NINETEEN HUNDRED AND FORTY-FIVE.

Title: Republic Act No. 55
Description: AN ACT TO IMPOSE A WAR PROFITS TAX

Title: Republic Act No. 56
Description: AN ACT AMENDING OR REPEALING CERTAIN SECTIONS OF TITLE IV OF COMMONWEALTH ACT NUMBERED FOUR HUNDRED AND SIXTY-SIX RELATIVE TO SPECIFIC TAXES.

Title: Republic Act No. 57
Description: AN ACT TO AMEND SECTION TWENTY-NINE OF ACT NUMBERED TWENTY-SEVEN HUNDRED AND ELEVEN, KNOWN AS THE REVISED ADMINISTRATIVE CODE.

Title: Republic Act No. 58
Description: AN ACT CREATING THE MUNICIPALITY OF TUBOD, PROVINCE OF LANAO

Title: Republic Act No. 59
Description: AN ACT TO MAKE ELECTIVE THE OFFICES OF PROVINCIAL GOVERNOR AND MEMBER OF THE PROVINCIAL BOARD, AND TO FIX THE COMPENSATION OF THE PROVINCIAL OFFICIALS, OF BUKIDNON, COTABATO, LANAO, SULU AND MOUNTAIN PROVINCE.

Title: Republic Act No. 60
Description: AN ACT AMENDING SECTION TWENTY-FIVE HUNDRED SIX-A UNDER ARTICLE XI-A OF THE REVISED ADMINISTRATIVE CODE.

Title: Republic Act No. 61
Description: AN ACT TO RECREATE THE FORMER MUNICIPALITY OF QUINAPONDAN, PROVINCE OF SAMAR

Title: Republic Act No. 62
Description: AN ACT TO REQUIRE THE PRESENTATION OF PROOF OF OWNERSHIP OF SECURITIES AND THE RECONSTRUCTION OF CORPORATE AND PARTNERSHIP RECORDS, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES.

Title: Republic Act No. 63
Description: AN ACT TO AMEND COMMONWEALTH ACT NUMBERED SIX HUNDRED NINETY-ONE ENTITLED "AN ACT TO PROVIDE FOR THE FREE DISTRIBUTION, UNDER CERTAIN CONDITIONS, OF LOTS OF TWENTY-FOUR HECTARES EACH OF AGRICULTURAL LAND OF THE PUBLIC DOMAIN."

Title: Republic Act No. 64
Description: AN ACT AMENDING COMMONWEALTH ACT NUMBERED SEVEN HUNDRED AND TWENTY-SIX, BY EXTENDING THE PROVISIONS THEREOF TO MUTUAL BUILDING AND LOAN ASSOCIATIONS UNDER CERTAIN CONDITIONS.

Title: Republic Act No. 65
Description: AN ACT PROVIDING FOR A BILL OF RIGHTS FOR OFFICERS AND ENLISTED MEN OF THE PHILIPPINE ARMY AND OF RECOGNIZED OR DESERVING GUERRILLA ORGANIZATIONS, AND VETERANS OF THE PHILIPPINE REVOLUTIONS, CREATING THEREFOR A PHILIPPINE VETERANS BOARD IN THE DEPARTMENT OF NATIONAL DEFENSE, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES.

Title: Republic Act No. 66
Description: AN ACT TO AMEND COMMONWEALTH ACT NUMBERED SIX HUNDRED AND EIGHTY-NINE, ENTITLED "AN ACT TO PENALIZE SPECULATION ON RENTS OF BUILDINGS DESTINED FOR DWELLING PURPOSES.

Title: Republic Act No. 67
Description: AN ACT TO AMEND CERTAIN SECTIONS OF COMMONWEALTH ACT NUMBERED FIFTY-EIGHT, KNOWN AS THE CHARTER OF THE CITY OF CEBU, AS AMENDED BY COMMONWEALTH ACT NUMBERED ONE HUNDRED AND TWENTY-NINE.

Title: Republic Act No. 68
Description: AN ACT REGULATING THE PRICES OF ADMISSION TO THEATERS, CINEMATOGRAPHS, HORSE RACES, JAI ALAI AND OTHER PLACES OF AMUSEMENT, AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS.

Title: Republic Act No. 69
Description: AN ACT PROVIDING FOR THE TRANSMISSION FREE OF CHARGE WITHIN THE PHILIPPINES OF MAIL MATTER OF SENATORS AND OF MEMBERS OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES OF THE PHILIPPINES.

Title: Republic Act No. 70
Description: AN ACT TO MAKE OBLIGATORY THE EMPLOYMENT OF A PHYSICIAN IN CERTAIN VESSELS ENGAGED IN COASTWISE TRADE.

Title: Republic Act No. 71
Description: AN ACT REQUIRING PRICE TAGS OR LABELS TO BE AFFIXED ON ALL ARTICLES OF COMMERCE OFFERED FOR SALE AT RETAIL AND PENALIZING VIOLATIONS OF SUCH REQUIREMENT.

Title: Republic Act No. 72
Description: AN ACT TO FURTHER AMEND ACT NUMBERED FORTY-ONE HUNDRED AND THIRTY, AS AMENDED, REGARDING THE APPORTIONMENT AND DISTRIBUTION OF THE PROCEEDS FROM SWEEPSTAKES RACES.

Title: Republic Act No. 73
Description: AN ACT TO SUBMIT TO THE FILIPINO PEOPLE, FOR APPROVAL OR DISAPPROVAL, THE AMENDMENT TO THE CONSTITUTION OF THE PHILIPPINES TO BE APPENDED AS AN ORDINANCE THERETO, PROPOSED BY THE CONGRESS OF THE PHILIPPINES IN A RESOLUTION OF BOTH HOUSES, ADOPTED ON SEPTEMBER EIGHTEEN, NINETEEN HUNDRED AND FORTY-SIX, AND TO APPROPRIATE FUNDS THEREFOR.

Title: Republic Act No. 74
Description: AN ACT TO AMEND ACT NUMBERED TWENTY-SEVEN HUNDRED AND SIX AS AMENDED BY ACT NUMBERED THIRTY HUNDRED AND SEVENTY-FIVE AND COMMONWEALTH ACT NUMBERED ONE HUNDRED AND EIGHTY PROVIDING FOR ADDITIONAL EXPENSES IN THE SUPERVISION AND REGULATION OF PRIVATE SCHOOLS, COLLEGES AND UNIVERSITIES AND FOR A REVOLVING FUND FOR THE PURCHASE AND SALE OF TEXTBOOKS TO PRIVATE SCHOOL STUDENTS, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES.

Title: Republic Act No. 75
Description: AN ACT TO PENALIZE ACTS WHICH WOULD IMPAIR THE PROPER OBSERVANCE BY THE REPUBLIC AND INHABITANTS OF THE PHILIPPINES OF THE IMMUNITIES, RIGHTS, AND PRIVILEGES OF DULY ACCREDITED FOREIGN DIPLOMATIC AND CONSULAR AGENTS IN THE PHILIPPINES.

Title: Republic Act No. 76
Description: AN ACT TO REPEAL LAWS OR PROVISIONS OF LAWS GRANTING RIGHTS TO AMERICAN CITIZENS, CORPORATIONS, AND ASSOCIATIONS, UNLESS THEY AFFECT RIGHTS ALREADY VESTED UNDER THE CONSTITUTION OR EXTENDED BY TREATY, AGREEMENT OR CONVENTION WITH THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA.

Title: Republic Act No. 77
Description: AN ACT TO AMEND SECTION SIX OF THE ACT, ENTITLED "AN ACT TO RAISE REVENUE FOR THE PHILIPPINE ISLANDS,AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES APPROVED BY THE CONGRESS OF THE UNITED STATES ON AUGUST FIFTH, NINETEEN HUNDRED AND NINE, AS AMENDED BY ACT NUMBERED FORTY HUNDRED AND THIRTY-FOUR OF THE PHILIPPINE LEGISLATURE, BY PROVIDING A METHOD OF CONVERSION BASED ON THE CURRENT RATES OF EXCHANGE.

Title: Republic Act No. 78
Description: AN ACT TO CREATE AN ADVANCE FUND OF FIVE MILLION PESOS TO FINANCE A GENERAL REVISION OF REAL PROPERTY ASSESSMENTS IN THE PROVINCES AND CHARTERED CITIES.

Title: Republic Act No. 79
Description: AN ACT TO AUTHORIZE THE HOLDING BY THE PHILIPPINE CHARITY SWEEPSTAKE OFFICE OF HORSE RACES, WITH BETTING, ON SATURDAY AFTERNOONS, FOR CHARITABLE, RELIEF AND CIVIC PURPOSES.

Title: Republic Act No. 81
Description: AN ACT TO AID THE MINING INDUSTRY BY PROVIDING FOR THE WAIVER OF, AND/OR EXTENSION OF THE PERIOD WITHIN WHICH TO PERFORM, ACCOMPLISH OR COMPLY WITH, ANY TERM, CONDITION, OR STIPULATION REQUIRED OF LOCATORS, HOLDERS, LESSEES, OR OPERATORS OF MINING CLAIMS OR CONCESSIONS, AND OF WATER RIGHTS AND TIMBER CONCESSIONS CONNECTED WITH THE MINING INDUSTRY, AND THE CONDONATION OF MINING, SPECIFIC AND REAL ESTATE TAXES, UNDER CERTAIN TERMS AND CONDITIONS.

Title: Republic Act No. 82
Description: AN ACT TO AMEND SECTIONS TWENTY-ONE, TWENTY-TWO, TWENTY-THREE, TWENTY-FOUR, TWENTY-SEVEN, TWENTY-NINE, THIRTY, THIRTY-FOUR, FIFTY-THREE, FIFTY-FOUR, AND TO REPEAL SUBSECTION (u) OF SECTION EIGHTY-FOUR OF COMMONWEALTH ACT NUMBERED FOUR HUNDRED AND SIXTY-SIX, AS AMENDED.

Title: Republic Act No. 83
Description: AN ACT TO AMEND SECTIONS EIGHTY-SIX, EIGHTY-NINE, ONE HUNDRED AND TEN, ONE HUNDRED AND TWELVE, ONE HUNDRED AND SIXTEEN AND ONE HUNDRED AND TWENTY-TWO OF TITLE III OF COMMONWEALTH ACT NUMBERED FOUR HUNDRED AND SIXTY-SIX.

Title: Republic Act No. 84
Description: AN ACT TO AMEND SECTIONS TWO HUNDRED AND NINETY-ONE, TWO HUNDRED AND NINETY-TWO, TWO HUNDRED AND NINETY-SEVEN, TWO HUNDRED AND NINETY-NINE, AND THREE HUNDRED AND TWO OF COMMONWEALTH ACT NUMBERED FOUR HUNDRED AND SIXTY-SIX, RELATIVE TO THE FIREARMS TAX, RADIO FEES AND TOBACCO INSPECTION FEES.

Title: Republic Act No. 85
Description: AN ACT CREATING THE REHABILITATION FINANCE CORPORATION

Title: Republic Act No. 86
Description: AN ACT AUTHORIZING THE SECRETARY OF FINANCE TO WITHDRAW FROM THE TREASURY CERTIFICATE FUND SUCH SUMS AS ARE IN EXCESS OF THE LEGAL RESERVE REQUIREMENT, AND APPROPRIATING THE SAME TO PAY FOR SUBSCRIPTIONS OF THE GOVERNMENT OF THE REPUBLIC OF THE PHILIPPINES TO THE CAPITAL STOCK OF THE REHABILITATION FINANCE CORPORATION.

Title: Republic Act No. 87
Description: AN ACT APPROPRIATING THE NET PROCEEDS FROM THE SALES OF SURPLUS PROPERTY AND PROPERTIES ACQUIRED FROM SUCH PROCEEDS OR EXCHANGES WITH SURPLUS PROPERTY TO PAY FOR SUBSCRIPTIONS TO THE CAPITAL STOCK OF THE REHABILITATION FINANCE CORPORATION.

Title: Republic Act No. 88
Description: AN ACT APPROPRIATING FIFTY-SEVEN MILLION SIXTY-FIVE THOUSAND PESOS FOR PUBLIC WORKS.

Title: Republic Act No. 89
Description: AN ACT TO AMEND SECTION FOUR OF COMMONWEALTH ACT NUMBERED FIVE HUNDRED AND SIXTY-FIVE BY WITHDRAWING THE EXEMPTION GRANTED IN FAVOR OF COOPERATIVE ASSOCIATIONS REFERRED TO THEREIN FROM THE PAYMENT OF TAXES.

Title: Republic Act No. 90
Description: AN ACT CREATING THE MUNICIPALITY OF GAMAY, PROVINCE OF SAMAR

Title: Republic Act No. 91
Description: AN ACT TO PROVIDE FOR THE HOLDING OF A SPECIAL ELECTION TO FILL EXISTING VACANCIES IN THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES CALLED IN PROCLAMATION NUMBERED NINETEEN, DATED JANUARY SIX, NINETEEN HUNDRED AND FORTY-SEVEN, OF THE PRESIDENT OF THE PHILIPPINES, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES.

Title: Republic Act No. 92
Description: AN ACT AMENDING SECTIONS ONE AND SEVEN OF REPUBLIC ACT NUMBERED SEVENTEEN, ENTITLED "AN ACT TO PROVIDE FOR THE CIRCULATION OF TREASURY CERTIFICATES WITH THE OFFICIAL SEAL OF THE REPUBLIC OF THE PHILIPPINES STAMPED, PRINTED OR SUPERIMPOSED THEREON, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES.

Title: Republic Act No. 93
Description: AN ACT TO FURTHER AMEND SECTION FIFTY-EIGHT OF ACT NUMBERED FOUR HUNDRED AND NINETY-SIX, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS "THE LAND REGISTRATION ACT” AS AMENDED BY ACT NUMBERED FORTY HUNDRED AND TWENTY-NINE, AND TO PROVIDE FOR OTHER PURPOSES.

Title: Republic Act No. 94
Description: AN ACT TO AMEND SECTION ONE HUNDRED AND EIGHTY-TWO OF THE REVISED ADMINISTRATIVE CODE SO AS TO ALLOW THE GENERAL LAND REGISTRATION OFFICE TO USE ITS OWN SEAL INSTEAD OF THAT OF COURTS OF FIRST INSTANCE IN ALL PROCESSES ISSUED BY OR THROUGH SAID OFFICE.

Title: Republic Act No. 95
Description: AN ACT TO INCORPORATE THE PHILIPPINE NATIONAL RED CROSS

Title: Republic Act No. 96
Description: AN ACT TO AMEND SECTIONS THIRTY-ONE AND THIRTY-TWO OF ACT NUMBERED FOUR HUNDRED AND NINETY-SIX, AND SECTIONS SEVEN AND EIGHT OF ACT NUMBERED TWENTY-TWO HUNDRED AND FIFTY-NINE.

Title: Republic Act No. 97
Description: AN ACT EXEMPTING FROM THE TECHNICAL EXAMINATION APPLICANTS FOR CERTIFICATE AS THIRD MATES WHO ARE GRADUATES OF THE PHILIPPINE NAUTICAL SCHOOL WHO HAVE SERVED AS AGREGADO A PILOTO IN A SEAGOING SAILING VESSEL OR IN A SEAGOING STEAMER, BY AMENDING SUBSECTION (d) OF SECTION ELEVEN HUNDRED AND NINETY-ONE OF THE REVISED ADMINISTRATIVE CODE.

Title: Republic Act No. 98
Description: AN ACT PRESCRIBING A NEW SCALE OF SALARIES ALLOWABLE FOR CERTAIN CIVIL SERVICE EXAMINATIONS.

Title: Republic Act No. 99
Description: AN ACT FURTHER AMENDING SECTION SIXTEEN HUNDRED AND SEVENTY-FOUR OF THE REVISED ADMINISTRATIVE CODE

Title: Republic Act No. 100
Description: AN ACT TO AUTHORIZE ANY COMMISSIONER OF THE PHILIPPINE WAR DAMAGE COMMISSION WHO IS A CITIZEN OF THE PHILIPPINES, AND CERTAIN OFFICERS AND EMPLOYEES THEREOF, ATTORNEYS OF THE LEGAL AID OFFICE OF THE DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE AND PUBLIC SCHOOL TEACHERS AND OTHER PUBLIC SCHOOL OFFICIALS, TO ADMINISTER OATHS ON CLAIM PAPERS TO BE SUBMITTED TO THE PHILIPPINE WAR DAMAGE COMMISSION.

Title: Republic Act No. 101
Description: AN ACT TO AMEND ACT NUMBERED ONE THOUSAND EIGHT HUNDRED AND SEVENTY ENTITLED "AN ACT FORT EH PURPOSE OF FOUNDING A UNIVERSITY FOR THE PHILIPPINE ISLAND, GIVING IT CORPORATE EXISTENCE, PROVIDING FOR A BOARD'S RESPONSIBILITIES AND DUTIES, PROVIDING HIGHER AND PROFESSIONAL INSTRUCTION, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES," AS AMENDED BY ELIMINATING THE PROVISIONS EXCLUDING THE ALUMNI OF THE UNIVERSITY OF THE PHILIPPINES AMONG PERSONS WHO MAY BE CONFERRED HONORARY DEGREES BY THE UNIVERSITY.

Title: Republic Act No. 102
Description: AN ACT TO AMEND SECTION TWENTY-SEVEN HUNDRED AND FIFTY OF ACT NUMBERED KNOWN AS THE REVISED ADMINISTRATIVE CODE, MAKING THE PROVISIONS OF SAID SECTION MORE EFFECTIVE AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES.

Title: Republic Act No. 103

Title: Republic Act No. 104
Description: AN ACT REQUIRING CORPORATIONS, AGENCIES OR INSTRUMENTALITIES OWNED OR CONTROLLED BY THE GOVERNMENT TO PAY TAXES, DUTIES, FEES, AND OTHER CHARGES.

Title: Republic Act No. 105

Title: Republic Act No. 106
Description: AN ACT TO AMEND SECTION ONE OF COMMONWEALTH ACT NUMBERED SIXTY-THREE. ENTITLED "AN ACT PROVIDING FOR THE WAYS IN WHICH PHILIPPINE CITIZENSHIP MAY BE LOST OR REACQUIRED."

Title: Republic Act No. 107

Title: Republic Act No. 108
Description: AN ACT TO AMEND SECTION SIXTEEN HUNDRED AND TWENTY-SIX OF ACT NUMBERED TWENTY-SEVEN HUNDRED AND ELEVEN, KNOWN AS THE REVISED ADMINISTRATIVE CODE.

Title: Republic Act No. 109
Description: AN ACT AMENDING SECTION TEN, COMMONWEALTH ACT NUMBERED SIX HUNDRED AND FIFTY-THREE, BY INCREASING THE DOCUMENTARY STAMP TO BE AFFIXED BY AN ALIEN TO CERTIFICATE OF REGISTRATION.

Title: Republic Act No. 110
Description: AN ACT TO AUTHORIZE THE PRINTING AND ISSUE OF SEMI-POSTAL STAMPS FOR CERTAIN PURPOSES.

Title: Republic Act No. 111
Description: AN ACT AMENDING SECTION NINE OF ACT NUMBERED THREE THOUSAND NINE HUNDRED AND FIFTY-TWO, ENTITLED "AN ACT TO REGULATE THE SALE, TRANSFER, MORTGAGE OR ASSIGNMENT OF GOODS, WARES, MERCHANDISE, PROVISIONS OR MATERIALS, IN BULK, AND PRESCRIBING PENALTIES FOR THE VIOLATION OF THE PROVISIONS THEREOF."

Title: Republic Act No. 116
Description: AN ACT TO AMEND SECTION ONE HUNDRED AND NINETY-EIGHT OF THE REVISED ADMINISTRATIVE CODE.

Title: Republic Act No. 117

Title: Republic Act No. 120
Description: AN ACT AMENDING ARTICLE THREE HUNDRED AND TEN OF ACT NUMBERED THIRTY-EIGHT HUNDRED AND FIFTEEN, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE REVISED PENAL CODE, AS AMENDED.

Title: Republic Act No. 121
Description: AN ACT TO FURTHER AMEND SECTION EIGHTEEN HUNDRED AND THIRTY-EIGHT OF ACT NUMBERED TWENTY-SEVEN HUNDRED AND ELEVEN, KNOWN AS THE REVISED ADMINISTRATIVE CODE, AS AMENDED BY ACT NUMBERED THIRTY-EIGHT HUNDRED AND TWENTY AND COMMONWEALTH ACT NUMBERED ONE HUNDRED.

Title: Republic Act No. 122

Title: Republic Act No. 125

Description: AN ACT AMENDING THE THIRD PARAGRAPH OF SECTION SIXTEEN HUNDRED AND THIRTY-SEVEN OF THE REVISED ADMINISTRATIVE CODE, AS AMENDED.

Description: AN ACT AMENDING SECTION TWO THOUSAND FOUR HUNDRED THIRTY-FOUR (a) OF THE REVISED ADMINISTRATIVE CODE.

Title: Republic Act No. 141

SWIFT, AND LATER TAKEN OVER BY THE MANILA ELECTRIC COMPANY, TO CONSTRUCT, MAINTAIN, AND OPERATE AN ELECTRIC LIGHT, HEAT, AND POWER SYSTEM IN THE CITY OF MANILA AND ITS SUBURBS.

Description: AN ACT CHANGING THE NAME OF BARRIO SAMBAT, IN THE MUNICIPALITY OF ROSARIO, PROVINCE OF BATANGAS, TO LUMANGBAYAN.

Title: Republic Act No. 197
Description: AN ACT CREATING THE MUNICIPALITY OF LEMERY IN THE PROVINCE OF ILOILO

Title: Republic Act No. 198
Description: AN ACT APPROPRIATING THE SUM OF ONE HUNDRED THOUSAND PESOS TO DEFRAY THE EXPENSES OF THE TRAINING, PREPARATION AND PARTICIPATION OF A FILIPINO ATHLETIC DELEGATION IN THE NINETEEN HUNDRED AND FORTY-EIGHT OLYMPICS IN LONDON.

Title: Republic Act No. 199
Description: AN ACT TO PROVIDE FOR THE RETIREMENT OF TREASURY CERTIFICATES OF PRE-WAR SERIES AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES.

Title: Republic Act No. 206

Title: Republic Act No. 207
Description: AN ACT AUTHORIZING THE PRESIDENT OF THE PHILIPPINES WITHIN A PERIOD OF TWO YEARS TO APPOINT OFFICERS FROM THE RESERVE FORCE INTO THE REGULAR FORCE OF THE ARMED FORCES OF THE PHILIPPINES ABOVE THE GRADE OF SECOND LIEUTENANT.

Title: Republic Act No. 208
Description: AN ACT PROVIDING A LIFE PENSION FOR WIDOWS OF EX-PRESIDENTS OF THE PHILIPPINES

Title: Republic Act No. 209
Description: AN ACT TO AMEND THE TITLE AND SECTIONS ONE, THREE, SEVEN, EIGHT, AND NINE OF REPUBLIC ACT NUMBERED ONE HUNDRED AND THIRTY-SIX.

Title: Republic Act No. 210

Title: Republic Act No. 211
Description: AN ACT AUTHORIZING THE RETIREMENT AND REDEMPTION OF THE CIRCULATING NOTES LAWFULLY ISSUED BY THE PHILIPPINE NATIONAL BANK AND THE REGISTRATION AND DEPOSIT OF SUCH NOTES ILLEGALLY ISSUED, APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR.

Title: Republic Act No. 212
Description: AN ACT CREATING THE BARRIO OF SAN JUAN IN THE MUNICIPALITY OF MABINI, PROVINCE OF BATANGAS.

Title: Republic Act No. 213
Description: AN ACT TO AMEND SECTION ONE OF REPUBLIC ACT NUMBERED SIXTEEN ENTITLED "AN ACT AUTHORIZING THE PRESIDENT OF THE PHILIPPINES TO OBTAIN SUCH LOANS OR INCUR SUCH INDEBTEDNESS WITH THE GOVERNMENT OF THE UNITED STATES, ITS AGENCIES AND INSTRUMENTALITIES AS MAY BE NECESSARY TO COVER BUDGETARY DEFICITS AND OTHER EXPENDITURES OF THE GOVERNMENT OF THE REPUBLIC OF THE PHILIPPINES FOR REHABILITATION AND OTHER PURPOSES, AND APPROPRIATING THE NECESSARY FUNDS THEREFOR."

Title: Republic Act No. 214
Description: AN ACT GRANTING MONETARY REWARDS TO ANY PERSON WHO SHALL LOCATE OR FIND THE REMAINS OF THE LATE CONGRESSMAN WENCESLAO VINZONS AND GOVERNOR ROQUE ABLAN.

Title: Republic Act No. 215
Description: AN ACT TO AMEND SECTION ONE OF THE REPUBLIC ACT NUMBERED EIGHTY-ONE PROVIDING A NEW TIME LIMIT FOR THE WAIVER OF, AND/OR EXTENSION OF THE PERIOD WITHIN WHICH TO PERFORM, ACCOMPLISH OR COMPLY WITH, ANY TERM, CONDITION, OR STIPULATION REQUIRED OF LOCATORS, HOLDERS, LESSEES, OPERATORS OF MINING CLAIMS OR CONCESSIONS, AND OF WATER RIGHTS AND TIMBER CONCESSIONS CONNECTED WITH THE MINING INDUSTRY, AND THE CONDONATION OF MINING, SPECIFIC AND REAL ESTATE TAXES, UNDER CERTAIN TERMS AND CONDITIONS.

Title: Republic Act No. 216
Description: AN ACT TO AUTHORIZE THE EXPENDITURE OF THE PROCEEDS OF A LOAN NOW BEING APPLIED FOR BY THE GOVERNMENT FOR THE CONSTRUCTION OF CERTAIN HYDRO-ELECTRIC POWER PROJECTS AND THE ERECTION OF A FERTILIZER PLANT.

Title: Republic Act No. 217
Description: AN ACT TO AMEND SECTIONS ONE HUNDRED AND EIGHTY-FOUR AND ONE HUNDRED AND EIGHTY-FIVE OF COMMONWEALTH ACT NUMBERED FOUR HUNDRED AND SIXTY-SIX, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE NATIONAL INTERNAL REVENUE CODE, AS AMENDED.

Title: Republic Act No. 218
Description: AN ACT TO AMEND SECTION TWO HUNDRED EIGHTY-FOUR AND SECTION TWO HUNDRED EIGHTY-FIVE-A OF THE REVISED ADMINISTRATIVE CODE, AS AMENDED.

Title: Republic Act No. 219

Title: Republic Act No. 220

Title: Republic Act No. 221

Title: Republic Act No. 222

Title: Republic Act No. 223

Title: Republic Act No. 227

Title: Republic Act No. 230

Description: AN ACT AUTHORIZING THE PRESIDENT TO DEFINE THE BOUNDARIES OF NUEVA VIZCAYA

Title: Republic Act No. 237

Description: AN ACT AMENDING SECTIONS ONE HUNDRED AND EIGHTY-THREE AND ONE HUNDRED AND NINETY OF THE NATIONAL INTERNAL REVENUE CODE, AS AMENDED.

HERNANDEZ, AND LATER TAKEN OVER BY THE CACHO AND HIDALGO COPARTNERSHIP TO CONSTRUCT, MAINTAIN, AND OPERATE AN ELECTRIC LIGHT, HEAT, AND POWER SYSTEM IN THE MUNICIPALITY OF DAET, PROVINCE OF CAMARINES NORTE.

Title: Republic Act No. 282

Description: AN ACT CREATING THE CITY OF LEGASPI

ROXAS, WHICH SHALL BE DISTRIBUTED WITHOUT CHARGE TO ALL PUBLIC LIBRARIES SCHOOLS AND COLLEGES, AND SOLD TO THE PUBLIC AT COST.

Title: Republic Act No. 735

Title: Republic Act No. 746

Title: Republic Act No. 748

Title: Republic Act No. 749
Description: AN ACT TO AMEND CERTAIN SECTIONS OF COMMONWEALTH ACT NUMBERED SIX HUNDRED AND THIRTEEN, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE PHILIPPINE IMMIGRATION ACT OF NINETEEN HUNDRED AND FORTY, AS AMENDED.

Title: Republic Act No. 750

Title: Republic Act No. 753
Description: AN ACT AMENDING SECTIONS ONE THOUSAND FIFTY-EIGHT, ONE THOUSAND FIFTY-NINE, ONE THOUSAND SIXTY, ONE THOUSAND SIXTY-ONE, ONE THOUSAND SIXTY-TWO, ONE THOUSAND SIXTY-THREE, ONE THOUSAND SIXTY-FOUR, ONE THOUSAND SIXTY-FIVE, ONE THOUSAND SIXTY-SIX, ONE THOUSAND SIXTY-SEVEN, ONE THOUSAND SIXTY-EIGHT, ONE THOUSAND SIXTY-NINE, ONE THOUSAND SEVENTY AND ONE THOUSAND SEVENTY-ONE OF ARTICLE FIFTEEN OF ACT NUMBERED TWENTY-SEVEN HUNDRED AND ELEVEN KNOWN AS THE REVISED ADMINISTRATIVE CODE, PROVIDING FOR THE CONTROL OF LEPROSY AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES.

Title: Republic Act No. 762

Title: Republic Act No. 763

Title: Republic Act No. 772

PRESCRIBING THE COMPENSATION TO BE RECEIVED BY EMPLOYEES FOR PERSONAL INJURIES, DEATH OR ILLNESS CONTRACTED IN THE PERFORMANCE OF THEIR DUTIES", AS AMENDED BY ACT NUMBERED THREE THOUSAND EIGHT HUNDRED AND TWELVE AND BY COMMONWEALTH ACT NUMBERED TWO HUNDRED AND TEN PROVIDING FOR ITS ADMINISTRATION BY A WORKMEN'S COMPENSATION COMMISSIONER; AND PRESCRIBING HIS POWERS AND DUTIES.

Title: Republic Act No. 795

Title: Republic Act No. 796

Title: Republic Act No. 797
Description: AN ACT GRANTING FELIPE PICA A FRANCHISE FOR AN ELECTRIC LIGHT, HEAT AND POWER SYSTEM IN THE MUNICIPALITY OF CAPALONGA, PROVINCE OF CAMARINES NORTE.

Title: Republic Act No. 798

Title: Republic Act No. 802

Title: Republic Act No. 803

Title: Republic Act No. 814
Description: AN ACT TO AMEND SECTIONS ONE, TWO AND FIVE AND TO REPEAL SECTIONS THREE AND FOUR OF REPUBLIC ACT NUMBERED SIX HUNDRED AND ONE, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE EXCHANGE TAX LAW.

Title: Republic Act No. 815
Description: AN ACT TO AMEND REPUBLIC ACT NUMBERED FIVE HUNDRED AND SEVENTY-THREE, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE "PHILIPPINE MILITARY AID TO THE UNITED NATIONS ACT", AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES.

Title: Republic Act No. 818
Description: AN ACT TO FURTHER AMEND SUBPARAGRAPHS (1) AND (2) OF SUBSECTION (b) OF SECTION ONE HUNDRED THIRTY-SEVEN OF THE NATIONAL INTERNAL REVENUE CODE, AS AMENDED.

Title: Republic Act No. 819

Title: Republic Act No. 820

Title: Republic Act No. 822

Title: Republic Act No. 823

Title: Republic Act No. 824

Title: Republic Act No. 827

Description: AN ACT TO APPROPRIATE FUNDS FOR THE ACQUISITION, CONSTRUCTION, MAINTENANCE, AND OPERATION OF MEDICAL, FIRE-FIGHTING, CRASH, RESCUE STATIONS, EQUIPMENT AND OTHER FACILITIES NEEDED BY AIRPORTS, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES.

Title: Republic Act No. 829

Title: Republic Act No. 830

Title: Republic Act No. 831

Title: Republic Act No. 832

Title: Republic Act No. 834

Title: Republic Act No. 836

Title: Republic Act No. 837

Title: Republic Act No. 838

Title: Republic Act No. 839

Title: Republic Act No. 840

Title: Republic Act No. 841

Title: Republic Act No. 865
Description: AN ACT TO AMEND SECTIONS TWO, THIRTY-THREE AND THIRTY-NINE OF REPUBLIC ACT NUMBERED ONE HUNDRED AND SIXTY-SIX.

AMMEN TRANSPORTATION COMPANY, INCORPORATED, AND/OR ITS ASSOCIATES AND SUBSIDIARIES,A TEMPORARY PERMIT TO CONSTRUCT, INSTALL, ESTABLISH AND OPERATE PRIVATE FIXED POINT-TO-POINT AND LAND-BASED RADIO STATIONS FOR THE RECEPTION AND TRANSMISSION OF INTER-OFFICE RADIO COMMUNICATIONS WITHIN THE PHILIPPINES.

Description: AN ACT TO AMEND CERTAIN SECTIONS OF REPUBLIC ACT NUMBERED FOUR HUNDRED AND SIXTEEN, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE CHARTER OF THE PHILIPPINE NORMAL COLLEGE.

Title: Republic Act No. 1051

Title: Republic Act No. 1052
